name: unreasonable_phi
description: An implementation of The Unreasonable Effectiveness of Quasirandom Generators for Typescript

scripts.clean: rimraf -f dist && rimraf -f docs && mkdir docs
scripts.page: cp src/html/* docs/ && cp dist/es6/* docs/
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run typescript && npm run page && npm run test
scripts.host: npm run build && npm run serve

author: John Haugeland <stonecypher@gmail.com>
